News.Title: IBL Finance: NBFC Achieves ₹100 Crore AUM Milestone
News.Summary: IBL Finance, a small-cap NBFC, has reached ₹100 crore in Assets Under Management (AUM). The company plans to collaborate with 36 national NBFCs for expansion. IBL Finance has disbursed ₹154 crore to profitable NBFCs and aims to raise additional funds through various debt instruments for further growth. The company's NPAs have decreased to 1.99% for FY 2024-25.
